name: Pack of Sorcerers
description:
This is the game about surviving in dark cave against endless waves of enemies, but there are three main characters - Pack of Sorcerers!

- fire wizard, throws fireballs that deal a lot of damage, but he has big delay between shots.

 - lightning wizard, throws lightnings with less damage than fireball, but he can do it very fast.

- poison wizard, throws poison balls, kinda average between fireballs and lightnings.

There are three types of enemies:

- skeleton has few health points and only melee attack.

- demon, slow, but has more health points and attacks with fireballs.

- necromancer, dark brother of sorcerers, has a lot of health points and cannot deal any damage, but he can revive dead enemies! Except dead necromancers, of course. Kinda imbalance, but he has very big delay between revivals.

Controls are simple as usual:

Moving - WASD,

Shooting - left mouse button,

Rotating around center of pack - Q and E, counterclockwise and clockwise respectively.

So, lets see how many waves can you survive!
